title: Not just Zoom, Houseparty is a rage in this age
description: Not just Zoom, Houseparty is a rage in this ageHouseparty, which has previously been popular mainly with teens, builds in a slew of other features meant to encourage interaction, including the ability to remotely play games like trivia or “Heads Up,” or to ju…
